attributes.action: To have a member of staff trained in mental health first aid in all UK schools.
attributes.additional_details: We would like to make it compulsory for every school to train or employ a member of staff in the mental health services.
attributes.background: To make having one designated member of staff that is qualified to practice mental health first aid compulsory. This is because, in primary and secondary schools one in six students are most likely to suffer with a mental health condition. We believe that we all have the right to support.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593882
